info.title: Form Builder API
info.description: API for Form Builder application with authentication system

post.description: Authenticate user and return access token
Logout user and invalidate access token
Register a new user and return access token

get.description: Retrieve a specific form by ID for the authenticated user

put.description: Update a specific form by ID for the authenticated user

delete.description: Delete a specific form by ID for the authenticated user. All associated fields will be deleted automatically.

get.summary: Get all forms for authenticated user
get.description: Retrieve a list of all forms belonging to the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new form for the authenticated user

en.example: A contact form for customer inquiries

configuration.description: Field configuration including type, name, label, and HTML attributes

en.example: A contact form for customer inquiries
